text: Amelia: Bessie? Bessie?... Where are you stu...
Amelia: Oh, Adam... I didn't see you there.
Amelia: Didn't you see one of my cows? Baroness Besselie Von Hildenbrug Von Achten got lost.
Amelia: You didn't? Oh dear,what should i do. Cows are very expen... I mean vulnerable and dependable.
Amelia: Oh I know! You can help me find her! I will give you... this totally magical backpack! So what do you say? Do you accept.
